name: Simple Vegan Overnight Oats
description: Simple Vegan Overnight Oats are the easiest make-ahead breakfast ever! You can prepare several jars at a time and have a nutritious breakfast ready for every day of the week. I'll show you how! No chia seeds or other hard to find ingredients.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup non-dairy milk, I prefer vanilla soy milk

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the oats and non-dairy milk in a small container, preferably with a lid. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the oats and non-dairy milk in a small container, preferably with a lid. Cover and refrigerate overnight.

recipeInstructions.text: In the morning, you can eat the oats cold, or heat them in the microwave for 1 minute. Top with optional toppings. My favorite combination is with blueberries, chopped walnuts, dates and a drizzle of maple syrup.
